definition: of a dull greyish brown to brownish grey color, horse of a dull brownish grey color, make a dun color
details:
adjective
- of a dull greyish brown to brownish grey color
= example: of a dull greyish brown to brownish grey color
noun
- horse of a dull brownish grey color
- a color or pigment varying around a light grey-brown color
= example: a color or pigment varying around a light grey-brown color
= synonyms: fawn, greyish brown, grayish brown
verb
- make a dun color
- cure by salting
= example: cure by salting
- persistently ask for overdue payment
= example: persistently ask for overdue payment
- treat cruelly
= synonyms: torment
